phrs.translation: 采空区, 块组(Group Of Blocks), 充填废石, 矿内废石
玻器制法, 玻璃膏球

sentences.sentence: Take that horrid gob of gum out of your mouth!
sentences.translation: 把你嘴里那块讨厌的口香糖吐出来！

sentences.sentence: I guess Gob smacked is appropriate, isn't it, Jack?
sentences.translation: 我猜想轰出采空区是适当的，是不是，杰克？

sentences.sentence: Lastly, the paper simulates bolt timbering of the laneway along the gob.
sentences.translation: 最后，分析模拟了沿空巷道的锚杆支护情况。
